Package com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.abstractController.BaseController<Type,Repository,InputDto,Mapper,Service>
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.abstractController.SlugableController<Recipe,RecipeRepository,RecipeInput,RecipeMapper,RecipeService>
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.RecipeController
@Controller @RequestMapping(path="/api/v1/recipe") public class RecipeController extends SlugableController<Recipe,RecipeRepository,RecipeInput,RecipeMapper,RecipeService>
RecipeController is a REST controller that handles HTTP requests related to the Recipe entity. It extends the SlugableController and provides CRUD operations for Recipe entities. This controller uses the RecipeService to interact with the database and perform operations on Recipe entities. The RecipeController class is parameterized with the following types: - Recipe: The entity type that this controller handles. - RecipeRepository: The repository type used for accessing the database. - RecipeInput: The DTO type used for creating and updating recipes. - RecipeMapper: The mapper type used for converting between entities and DTOs. - RecipeService: The service type used for business logic operations.

  • Method Details

    • getByOutputId

      @GetMapping(value="/byOutputId/{id},", produces="application/json") public RecipeMapper getByOutputId(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Endpoint to fetch a recipe by its output ID. It uses the service to fetch the recipe and the mapper to map the entity to a response DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - The output ID of the recipe.
      Returns:
      A RecipeMapper object.
